Plot: This Oscar nominated film is the story of two men who are opposites, one gay, the other straight, one a fierce communist, the other a fierce individualist, one suspicious, the other accepting, and how they come to love each other.
Title: Strawberry and Chocolate
Writer: Tomás Gutiérrez Alea (collaboration), Senel Paz (screenplay), Senel Paz (story)
Director: Tomás Gutiérrez Alea, Juan Carlos Tabío
Actors: Jorge Perugorría, Vladimir Cruz, Mirta Ibarra, Francisco Gattorno
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 1 nomination.
